    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10461689">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10461689">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10461689">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Resources by Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_2" id="content10461104">
          <div id="boxatt10461104" class="boxatt">
           <div class="linklist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12715611">
              <a id="link_12715611" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/basicspeech" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715611,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715611});">
               Basic Speech
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12715626">
              <a id="link_12715626" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/costume" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715626,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715626});">
               Costume Design
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12715628">
              <a id="link_12715628" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/queerperform" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715628,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715628});">
               Queer Performance
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link18422506">
              <a id="link_18422506" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/theatresociety" target="_blank" onclick="hit(18422506,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18422506});">
               Theatre &amp; Society
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10461112">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10461112">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10461112">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10461112">
          <div id="boxatt10461112" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link20911620">
              <a id="link_20911620" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.alexanderstreet.com/daiv" target="_blank" onclick="hit(20911620,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 20911620}); ">
               Dance in Video
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of hours of dance productions and documentaries by the most influential performers and companies of the 20th century. Selections cover ballet, tap, jazz, contemporary, experimental, and improvisational dance, as well as forerunners of the forms and the pioneers of modern concert dance.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link16897609">
              <a id="link_16897609" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.dramaonlinelibrary.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(16897609,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 16897609}); ">
               Drama Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Includes the full text of plays from across the history of the theatre, ranging from Aeschylus to the present day. Includes non-English-language works in translation, scholarly and critical editions, first night program texts, and critical analysis and contextual information. Also includes over 500 images from the Victoria and Albert Museum's archive of production photos.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12715914">
              <a id="link_12715914" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://eebo.chadwyck.com/home" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715914,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715914}); ">
               Early English Books Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Digital facsimile page images of virtually every work printed in England, Ireland, Scotland, Wales and British North America and works in English printed elsewhere from 1473-1700.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12715915">
              <a id="link_12715915" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://infotrac.galegroup.com/itweb/mul_coll?db=ECCO" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715915,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715915}); ">
               Eighteenth Century Collections Online (ECCO)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Over 180,000 titles (200,000 volumes) comprising books, pamphlets, essays, broadsides and more based on the English Short Title Catalogue Works published in the UK during the 18th century plus thousands from elsewhere. Content covers critical information in the fields of history, literature, religion, law, fine arts, science and more. Primarily in English but also includes other languages.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12715956">
              <a id="link_12715956" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.alexanderstreet.com/ativ/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12715956,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Theatre and Dance', 'page_name' : 'Primary Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12715956}); ">
               Theatre in Video
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Contains performances of the world's leading plays and film documentaries. Some plays presented in multiple productions exemplifying various interpretations of the text, and technical and cultural differences among the presentations. Stage work of directors and actors are cross-searchable and available for side-by-side comparison. Interviews with directors, designers, writers, and actors, along with excerpts of live performances, provide illustration of the development of texts and the productions.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">

             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Kelly Cannon

  <script type="text/javascript">
   cssdropdown.startchrome("tabs12");
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   SpringTrack.trackPage({ 
                        st_type : content_config.hitsource, 
                        _st_gid : content_config.gid 
                    });
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
